CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Outlet Centers relative to MegaMall Chain?
SRP.A: Outlet Centers is {above} MegaMall Chain in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total in-store foot traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Outlet Centers}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total in-store foot traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {MegaMall Chain}.

VE.Q: What is Outlet Centers's In-Store Foot Traffic in 1977?
VE.A: Outlet Centers's in-store foot traffic in 1977 is {33991.86} visitors/day.

VE.Q: What is Outlet Centers's In-Store Foot Traffic in 1972?
VE.A: Outlet Centers's in-store foot traffic in 1972 is {24015.30} visitors/day.

VE.Q: What is MegaMall Chain's In-Store Foot Traffic in 1991?
VE.A: MegaMall Chain's in-store foot traffic in 1991 is {23122.64} visitors/day.

VE.Q: What are the in-store foot traffic of Fashion Boutiques, Outlet Centers, and MegaMall Chain in 1979?
VE.A: Fashion Boutiques's in-store foot traffic is {28615.50} visitors/day, Outlet Centers's in-store foot traffic is {37962.35} visitors/day, MegaMall Chain's in-store foot traffic is {18269.07} visitors/day.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum In-Store Foot Traffic in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum in-store foot traffic is {13670.18} visitors/day.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum In-Store Foot Traffic in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum in-store foot traffic is {64002.49} visitors/day.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest In-Store Foot Traffic level recorded for Fashion Boutiques?
EVJ.A: Fashion Boutiques reached approximately {47918.35} visitors/day in {1997}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest In-Store Foot Traffic level recorded for Fashion Boutiques?
EVJ.A: Fashion Boutiques's lowest recorded level is approximately {19860.97} visitors/day in {1970}.

SC.Q: What is the average total In-Store Foot Traffic?
SC.A: The average total in-store foot traffic is {96459.29} visitors/day.

NF.Q: Which years did the total In-Store Foot Traffic go below 80398.48 visitors/day? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {71992.09} visitors/day in {1973}, {67715.41} visitors/day in {1971}, {61006.12} visitors/day in {1969}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total In-Store Foot Traffic fall between 90736.27 and 100287.46 visitors/day? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {94436.53} visitors/day in {1982}, {100229.61} visitors/day in {1984}, {96165.96} visitors/day in {1980}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total In-Store Foot Traffic exceed 110625.25 visitors/day? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {117219.95} visitors/day in {1993}, {120608.60} visitors/day in {1991}, {116917.68} visitors/day in {1992}.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1987, was the average total In-Store Foot Traffic higher or lower than between 1971 and 1991?
NC.A: The average total in-store foot traffic between 1986 and 1987 was {higher} than between 1971 and 1991.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1994, was the average total In-Store Foot Traffic higher or lower than between 1973 and 1985?
NC.A: The average total in-store foot traffic between 1987 and 1994 was {higher} than between 1973 and 1985.

NC.Q: Was the total In-Store Foot Traffic in 1969 higher or lower than in 1979?
NC.A: The total in-store foot traffic in 1969 was {lower} than in 1979.

NC.Q: Was the total In-Store Foot Traffic in 1980 higher or lower than in 1990?
NC.A: The total in-store foot traffic in 1980 was {lower} than in 1990.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Outlet Centers} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {MegaMall Chain, Fashion Boutiques, Outlet Centers}.
